LanguageData.Gun_ATML.label: MS FGM-148 标枪导弹
LanguageData.Gun_ATML.description: A mounted light missile system MS FGM-148 Javelin on a slab. Uses one rocket.
LanguageData.Artillery_TOWMissile.label: BGM-71 TOW 导弹
LanguageData.Artillery_TOWMissile.description: TOW Missile Launcher. Launches high speed missiles. Medium accuracy with medium range.
LanguageData.Gun_MissileSystem.label: 中型导弹系统
LanguageData.Gun_MissileSystem.description: A mounted medium missile system on a turret. Uses three rockets.
LanguageData.Gun_RL.label: 重型导弹系统
LanguageData.Gun_RL.description: A mounted heavy missile system on a turret. Uses six rockets.
